refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This element is only available if you are using the EBNF Module.
A ProductionRecap is a cross reference to a Production.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: A ProductionRecap is rendered exactly like the production to which it refers. The purpose of the ProductionRecap element is to allow a ProductionSet to contain copies of Productions defined elsewhere. This frequently makes it easier for readers to understand.
